full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU LA BRTEN NAS GA-YANG 'BOD BYA TSUL DGOS 'DOD GRU CHAR 'BEBS PA'I CHU 'DZIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES MGON PO YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU LA BRTEN NAS GA-YANG 'BOD BYA TSUL DGOS 'DOD GRU CHAR 'BEBS PA'I CHU 'DZIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI AER TE NI JO NANG PI SE'I KHO SHO NAS RIGS RU STOBS 'BYOR PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING KHYAD PAR BLA MA DKON MCHOG SUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA LDAN CHI HU LA DGE BSKOS THO YON YE SHES TSUL KHRIMS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR,, ,,`KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG DZA YA PAndI TA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL SBRANG CHUNG PHYOGS MED SU MA TI AABHYA PRA BRA BHA RA MING GZHAN, ,` RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' LUNG GI AER TE NI PAndI TA ZHES 'BOD PA'I SGRA SNYAN MTSAN SDEBS SOGS GO BA MI SHES KYANG, RNAM RTOG MED PA'I DKAR SEMS @005B KYIS YIG RNYING MA RNYED KYANG, RNAM SRAS GA-YANG 'GUGS LAS GZHI BYAS, BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LAS KHA BSKANG TE SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON LDAN PA DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG 'OD ZER RO, ,'DI KYANG 'GRO KUN DBUL 'PHONGS KYI SDUG BSNGAL LAS GROL ZHING YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU LHA BUR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
